scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundleRelease: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable- && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.debugRelease: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable- && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.apkRelease: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable- && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.cleanIos: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && pod install && cd ..
